## op() function

Converts an opcode and operand to bytes, and returns their concatenation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function op(code: number, erand?: number | BytesLike | Hexable): Uint8Array;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  code | number | the opcode |
|  erand | number \| BytesLike \| Hexable | <i>(Optional)</i> the operand, currently limited to 1 byte (defaults to 0) |

<b>Returns:</b>

Uint8Array
